mapper.select: SELECT cou_wares_series.cou_series_id, cou_wares_series.cou_series_name, cou_wares_series.cou_brand_id, cou_wares_brand.cou_brand_name FROM cou_wares_series AS cou_wares_series JOIN cou_wares_brand AS cou_wares_brand ON cou_wares_series.cou_brand_id = cou_wares_brand.cou_brand_id WHERE cou_wares_series.cou_series_id = #{couSeriesId}
SELECT cou_series_id, cou_series_name FROM cou_wares_series WHERE cou_brand_id = #{couBrandId} AND status = #{status}
